Replace.Text: Enabling this option removes barbarians; by extension, it also overrides the 'Hostile Villager' options below and removes hostile villagers entirely.

Enabling this option prevents hostile villagers from appearing after receiving a tribal village reward; it does not eliminate hostile villagers as a possible tribal village 'reward' type. Will be ignored if 'No Barbarians' is enabled.

Enabling this option eliminates hostile villagers as a possible tribal village 'reward' type; it does not prevent hostile villagers from appearing after receiving any other tribal village reward. Will be ignored if 'No Barbarians' is enabled.
